original_title: Pernell Whitaker vs. Julio César Chávez
overview: Much anticipated fight between Mexican Legend Chávez and Olympic gold medalist & reigning WBC Welterweight champion Pernell Whitaker. Also, WBC Super Featherweight Championship: Azumah Nelson vs. 'Jesse' James Leija, and WBC Super Welterweight Championship: Terry Norris vs. Joe Gatti.
title: Pernell Whitaker vs. Julio César Chávez
